content: I was playing around with some wasm bits recently that aren't gonna pan out, but one thing I was curious about, is it planned to map the recent improvements to asm! to global_asm! as well? Basically using the similar syntax, but without as many formatting features, for defining global symbols and such
Sort of but it's not a high priority at the moment. There's also the issue that this will break include_str! since {} now needs to be escaped.
ah ok mostly just curious, I think what I want to do with wasm is still aways out
